name: Private Cafe
description: This is the first game I have developed, I have a team to develop games and we are just students. This is the story of this game (Note: I am not the author of the story, so I may not have explained the subject very well, we will fix it) we are given a cafe and some events happen to us while managing this cafe. The game is in Turkish, but thanks to one of my game development team, the game will be translated into English. I hope you enjoy playing the game. You can donate to support us.
